message: Bob, I have a unique opportunity for you to acquire a product that holds significant value. While I can't disclose the exact nature of the product just yet, I can assure you it's worth at least $1000000 to me. I'm offering it to you for $1500000. This price reflects the potential for you to realize even greater gains.  If you decline, I will be selling it to another buyer for $1000000. Please let me know your decision.
